窲字的基本解释

窲
cháo
〔寥（
li俹 ）窲〕幽深。

窲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cháo］
［《集韻》鋤交切，平爻，崇。］
见“寥窲”。

窲字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【穴字部】　窲； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页867第17
【集韻】鋤交切，音巢。寥窲，屋深貌。　又【王延壽·魯靈光殿賦】霐寥窲以崢嶸。【註】幽深貌。【文選·纂註】立巢切，音遼。　又【正字通】力弔切，音料。義同。

窲字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
窲字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
窲
cháo
〔very few(
li 俹)窲] deep and deep.
窲
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cháo］
["Ji Yun" hoe cross cut, flat line, Chong. ]
See "Liaoyu".
窲
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Acupoint Word Department] 　窲; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 867 Page 17
[Jiyun] hoe cross cut, sound nest. Very lonely, the house looks deep.　[Wang Yanshou·Lu Lingguang Palace Fu] 霐 窲窲峥嵘. [Note] Deep and deep appearance. [Selected Works · Compilation Notes] Lichao cut, sound Liao.　[Zhengzitong] Forced to hang and cut, sound material. The same meaning.
